$:/plugins/adithyab/tiddlyjam/htmlify.text:
\define _htmlify(text)
<$wikify name="output" text={{$text$}} mode="inline" output="html">
<$text text=<<output>>/>
</$wikify>
\end

<$macrocall $name="_htmlify" text={{!!title}}/>
$:/plugins/adithyab/tiddlyjam/htmlify.title: $:/plugins/adithyab/tiddlyjam/htmlify
$:/plugins/adithyab/tiddlyjam/htmlify.creator: Adithya_

$:/plugins/adithyab/tiddlyjam/page.text: All this does is provide renderer to tiddlies tagged as $:/plugins/adithyab/tiddlyjam/page

$:/plugins/adithyab/tiddlyjam/renderer/b.text:
\whitespace trim
\define tv-wikilink-template() $uri_doubleencoded$.html
\define tv-config-toolbar-icons() no
\define tv-config-toolbar-text() no
\define tv-config-toolbar-class() tc-btn-invisible
\import [[$:/core/ui/PageMacros]] [all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/Macro]!has[draft.of]]
`
<!doctype html>
<html lang="en">

<head>
  <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html;charset=utf-8" />

  <meta name="generator" content="TiddlyWiki" />
  <meta name="tiddlywiki-version" content="`{{$:/core/templates/version}}`" />

  <meta name="apple-mobile-web-app-capable" content="yes" />
  <meta name="apple-mobile-web-app-status-bar-style" content="black-translucent" />
  <meta name="mobile-web-app-capable" content="yes" />

  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1, shrink-to-fit=no">

  <meta name="format-detection" content="telephone=no">

  <link id="faviconLink" rel="shortcut icon" href="/favicon.ico">

`{{||$:/plugins/adithyab/tiddlyjam/renderer/base/seotags}}
  {{$:/plugins/adithyab/tiddlyjam/renderer/base/imports}}
  `
</head>

<body class="tc-body">
  `
  <$wikify name="output" text={{$:/plugins/adithyab/tiddlyjam/renderer/base/converter}} mode="inline" output="html">
    <$text text=<<output>>/>
  </$wikify>

{{$:/plugins/adithyab/tiddlyjam/renderer/base/footer||$:/plugins/adithyab/tiddlyjam/htmlify}}
	
  `
</body>
</html>
`
$:/plugins/adithyab/tiddlyjam/renderer/b.title: $:/plugins/adithyab/tiddlyjam/renderer/base
$:/plugins/adithyab/tiddlyjam/renderer/b.creator: Adithya_

$:/plugins/adithyab/tiddlyjam/renderer/b.text: Made with TiddlyJam by Adithya Badidey

$:/plugins/adithyab/tiddlyjam/renderer/b.text: TiddlyJam
$:/plugins/adithyab/tiddlyjam/renderer/b.title: $:/plugins/adithyab/tiddlyjam/renderer/base/header
$:/plugins/adithyab/tiddlyjam/renderer/b.creator: Adithya_

$:/plugins/adithyab/tiddlyjam/renderer/b.text:
\whitespace trim

`<title>`<<get_title>>`</title>
<meta name="description" content="`<<get_description>>`">

<meta property="og:type" content="article" />
<meta property="og:url" content="`<<get_absolute_url>>`" />
<meta property="og:title" content="`<<get_title>>`" />
<meta property="og:image" content="`<<get_image>>`" />
<meta property="og:description" content="`<<get_description>>`" />

<meta name="twitter:card" content="summary_large_image">
<meta name="twitter:site" content="@adithya_badidey">
<meta name="twitter:creator" content="@adithya_badidey">
<meta name="twitter:title" content="`<<get_title>>`" />
<meta name="twitter:description" content="`<<get_description>>`" />
<meta name="twitter:image" content="`<<get_image>>`" />
$:/plugins/adithyab/tiddlyjam/renderer/b.title: $:/plugins/adithyab/tiddlyjam/renderer/base/seotags
$:/plugins/adithyab/tiddlyjam/renderer/b.name: correct

$:/plugins/adithyab/tiddlyjam/renderer/m.text: \whitespace trim \define get_description() <$list filter="[all[current]get[description]]">{{!!title}}<$list filter="[all[current]!has[description]]"><$vars lf=" "><$list filter="[get[text]splittrim[]!is[blank]limit[1]]" variable="thisline"><$wikify name="out" text=<>}><> \end \define get_published_date() <$list filter="[{!!published}is[blank]then{!!created}else{!!published}]"><$view field="title" format="date" template="DDth MMM, YYYY" /> \end \define get_title() <$text text={{{ [get[name]else] }}} /> ~ {{$:/SiteTitle}} \end \define get_display_name() <$text text={{{ [get[name]else] }}} /> \end \define get_relative_url() /<$macrocall $name="tv-get-export-path" title={{!!title}}/> \end \define get_absolute_url() <$wikify name="url" text=<>><$text text={{{ [addprefix{$:/plugins/adithyab/tiddlyjam/renderer/baseurl}] }}}/> \end \define get_page_uniqueid() <$view field="created"/> \end \define tweet-this(url,title,description) \end

\end \define export-static-website() <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-zip-create" $param="$:/temp/_ZipTiddler"/> <$list filter="[tag[$:/plugins/adithyab/tiddlyjam/live]]"> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-zip-render-file" $param="$:/temp/_ZipTiddler" tiddler=<> template="$:/plugins/adithyab/tiddlyjam/renderer/base"/> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-zip-download" $param="$:/temp/_ZipTiddler" filename="tiddlyjam.zip"/> \end \define export-static-website2() <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-zip-create" $param="$:/temp/_ZipTiddler"/> <$list filter="[tag[$:/plugins/adithyab/tiddlyjam/live]]"> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-zip-render-file" $param="$:/temp/_ZipTiddler" filename={{{ [encodeuricomponent[]addsuffix[.html]] }}} tiddler=<> template="$:/plugins/adithyab/tiddlyjam/renderer/base"/> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-zip-render-file" $param="$:/temp/_ZipTiddler" filename="sitemap.xml" template="$:/plugins/adithyab/tiddlyjam/renderer/sitemap"/> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-zip-download" $param="$:/temp/_ZipTiddler" filename="tiddlyjam.zip"/> \end
